column4: I've never used the floppy drive in my current pc. I have no clue. it may be totally useless
the ubuntu-desktop package is the gnome libraries and associated files that allow you to see something besides the command line.
it amazes me how many new pc's don't even have them!
very untrue.  First thing I did with kde was turn off most of the (annoying) eye candy.  It's more configurable -- at least more easily for a newbie-- than gnome,
